function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People using the web interface for surveys may be at risk of exposure to contagious diseases if the interface is not properly sanitized or if it requires physical interaction with shared surfaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Regular sanitation of the web interface and promotion of virtual/remote survey participation.","Technologies":"Contactless interfaces, self-sanitizing materials, remote survey tools.","People":"Respondents using the web interface for surveys.","Owner":"Survey organizers, web interface developers."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in the survey area could contribute to the spread of airborne contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne disease transmission among people using the survey interface.","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation and air purification systems in the survey space.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, natural ventilation strategies.","People":"Respondents using the survey interface.","Owner":"Survey organizers, facility managers."},{"Description":"Shared devices or equipment in the survey area may serve as fomites for the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of surface-based disease transmission among respondents using shared devices.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of shared devices, promotion of personal device usage for the survey.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection, disposable device covers.","People":"Respondents using shared survey devices.","Owner":"Survey organizers, facility managers."}]}
